name: mediaRepeatMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the media repeat mode on a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the media repeat mode.

parameters.name: predefinedMediaRepeatMode
parameters.description: The predefined media repeat mode to set.
